short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ClockAssist browser-extension for automatic time tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ClockAssist automatically maps out your workday and is your perfect reminder for while logging hours. 

The extension contains affiliate-link implementation which is only used for users to invite other users, this isn't used in combination of partners or sales, just as an unique-id for inviting other users within the same company.
long.nl: ClockAssist brengt je werkdag automatisch in kaart en is je perfecte geheugensteun voor tijdens het urenregistreren.
